channel.title: Hybridpvp 317-602 client
channel.description:
where do i change the ip
i changed it in client.java but i can't find gui.java where i need to change it becauqse when i wanne login it says: error connection to server
tysm for helping ( if you help )

item.title: Hybridpvp 317-602 client
item.dc:creator: @xX_Derrick_Xx xX Derrick Xx
item.description:
@xX_Derrick_Xx wrote:

Go into client.java. Press Ctrl+F and search for server. Keep pressing search until you find “127.0.0.1.” There should be two of those("127.0.0.1). Change it to whatever you would like. & there is nothing in Gui.java you need to change for being able to connect to the server. The only reason you wouldn’t be able to connect is if your not portfowarding and your no-ip is on. If you are portfowarding make sure your ip is able to see the port. To check to to canyouseeme.org and type in 43594. Hope I helped.

Read full topic
